description: Let m = A013929(n); then a(n) = smallest k such that m divides k^3.
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10491
H. Ibstedt, Surfing on the Ocean of Numbers, Erhus Univ. Press, Vail, 1997.
maple: isA013929 := proc(n)    not numtheory[issqrfree](n) ;end proc:A013929 := proc(n)    option remember;    local a;    if n = 1 then        4;    else        for a from procname(n-1)+1 do            if isA013929(a) then                return a;            end if;        end do:    end if;end proc:A015050 := proc(n)    local m ;    m := A013929(n) ;    for k from 1 do        if modp(k^3,m) = 0 then            return k;        end if;    end do:end proc:
author: R. Muller
extensions: Description corrected by Diego Torres (torresvillarroel(AT)hotmail.com), Jun 23 2002
